name: PwetMalu
description: This is a simple shooter game I made using Godot Engine (3.0.2). I have just started learning Godot through watching youtube tutorials and reading Godot documentations from time to time. In this project, I followed Angega studios' space shooter tutorial and tweaked some codes in order to work on the newer version of Godot. I really had fun while doing this project, even if I don't have a background on game development, I was still able to manage to make a playable game.For my next project, I will be doing a 2d platformer and hopefully by the end of year 2018, I will be able to make one 3d game.
